ExceptionHandler.Description: Sample of error handler with On Error GoTo for procedure with code
ExceptionHandler.Text:
On Error GoTo $P[CODE_ELEMENT_NAME]_Error $P[METHOD_BODY] On Error GoTo 0 Exit $P[CODE_ELEMENT_KIND_KEYWORD]
$P[CODE_ELEMENT_NAME]_Error:
MsgBox "Error " & Err.Number & " (" & Err.Description & ") in procedure $P[CODE_ELEMENT_NAME], line " & Erl & "."
ExceptionHandler.Comment: Note: The undocumented Erl function used in the sample to get the line number requires that you add line numbers to your code. See the Add/Remove Line Numbers feature of MZ-Tools

ExceptionHandler.Description: Sample of error handler with On Error Resume Next for selected text
ExceptionHandler.Text: On Error Resume Next $P[SELECTED_TEXT] If Err.Number <> 0 Then MsgBox "Error " & Err.Number & " (" & Err.Description & ") in procedure $P[CODE_ELEMENT_NAME], line " & Erl & "." Exit $P[CODE_ELEMENT_KIND_KEYWORD] End If On Error GoTo 0
ExceptionHandler.Comment: Note: The undocumented Erl function used in the sample to get the line number requires that you add line numbers to your code. See the Add/Remove Line Numbers feature of MZ-Tools

ExceptionHandler.Text:
On Error GoTo $P[CODE_ELEMENT_NAME]_Error $P[METHOD_BODY_EXCLUDING_DECLARATIONS]
$P[CODE_ELEMENT_NAME]_No_Error: On Error GoTo 0 Exit $P[CODE_ELEMENT_KIND_KEYWORD]
$P[CODE_ELEMENT_NAME]_Error:
Call Error_Handle($P[CODE_ELEMENT_NAME], Err.Number, Err.description, Erl) Goto $P[CODE_ELEMENT_NAME]_No_Error
